com.silabs.bluetooth_mesh

Class NetworkInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silabs.bluetooth_mesh.NetworkInfo

  • public class NetworkInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    NetworkInfo class makes the main object of the Bluetooth Mesh, the Network object, which holds all the information necessary to run Bluetooth Mesh

      • id

        public int id()
        Gets the integer with the Network Index of the network
        Returns:
        Integer with the Network Index

      • phase

        public int phase()
        Gets integer that contains the phase of the network
        Returns:
        Integer with the Network phase (number of key refreshes)

      • minSecurity

        public int minSecurity()
        Gets integer with the minSecurity of the Network
        Returns:
        Integer containing the minSecurity (secure or insegure). Where secure is OOB Action of Input Numeric, Input Alphanumeric, Output Numeric, and OOB Size of at least 6 octets.

      • network_key

        public byte[] network_key()
        Gets the byte array with the network key
        Returns:
        byte[16] containing the network key

      • old_network_key

        public byte[] old_network_key()
        Gets the byte array with the old network key
        Returns:
        byte[16] containing the old network key

      • groupById

        public GroupInfo groupById(int groupId)
        Gets the GroupInfo object with the given index
        Parameters:
        groupId - Integer containing the GroupInfo object
        Returns:
        GroupInfo with the given id. Returns null if the index is not found

      • updateDeviceInfo

        public void updateDeviceInfo(DeviceInfo dev)
        Updates the deviceInfo in the DevicesInfo ArrayList with the given DeviceInfo. Must be called to keep the NetworkInfo object
        Parameters:
        dev - DeviceInfo objected containing the info to be updated in the network

      • removeDevice

        public void removeDevice(DeviceInfo d)
        Removes the device from the ArrayList of DeviceInfo in the network from the given DeviceInfo object
        Parameters:
        d - DeviceInfo object that will be removed from the ArrayList

      • removeGroup

        public void removeGroup(GroupInfo g)
        Removes the group from the ArrayList of GroupInfo in the network from the given GroupInfo object
        Parameters:
        g - GroupInfo object that will be removed from the ArrayList
